titleStmt.title: A treatise againste the preuee masse in the behalfe and furtheraunce of the mooste hylye communyon made by Edmund Gest. Reade gentyll reader and then iudge. M. D. XLVIII.
titleStmt.author: Gest, Edmund.

publicationStmt.publisher: In saynt Andrewes Paryshe, in the Waredrop. By [William Hill and] Thomas Raynald,

notesStmt.note: Title page varies: line 4 has misprint: "hylye" or is corrected to: "holye"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
